parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Vertex at which to get the radius

title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.GetDistance
description: Gets the Distance 2 radius for this asymmetric fillet.

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Vertex at which to get the radius

returns: Distance 2 radius at the vertex for the asymmetric fillet
remarks:
Call
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::GetRadius2
to get the Distance 1 radius at the vertex for this asymmetric fillet.
